profile.name: Shubham
profile.title: Engineering Technical Lead
profile.tagline: Engineering Team Lead | Full-Stack & Cloud Strategy | Building Scalable Products & High-Performing Teams
profile.bio: I'm a passionate technical lead and developer with expertise in building scalable web applications and beautiful user interfaces. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies and other core technologies, I create seamless digital experiences that make a difference.
profile.bioExtended: I believe in continuous learning to adapt to fast changing tech world. My journey in tech started with curiosity and grew into a career driven by innovation. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and staying updated with the latest industry trends.

experience.title: Expert Engineer / Tech Lead
experience.description: Leading development of enterprise-scale applications, mentoring junior developers, and architecting scalable solutions.

experience.title: Associate IT consultant (IS3)
experience.description: Developed custom web applications for clients across various industries, focusing on React and Node.js.

certifications.name: Certification in Introduction to data analytics

services.description: Providing end to end solutions to bring your application to production with quality standard.

services.title: Backend & API
services.description: Developing robust backend systems and RESTful APIs with Node.js and Python.

faq.question: What services do you offer?
faq.answer: I offer a range of services including web development, mobile app development, UI/UX design, and backend API development. I specialize in creating modern, responsive, and scalable digital solutions.

faq.question: What is your typical project timeline?
faq.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. A typical website takes 2-4 weeks, while larger applications can take 2-3 months. I'll provide a detailed timeline after understanding your requirements.

faq.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
faq.answer: Yes! I offer ongoing maintenance and support packages to ensure your project stays up-to-date, secure, and running smoothly. This includes bug fixes, updates, and feature enhancements.

faq.question: How do we get started?
faq.answer: Simply fill out the contact form above or send me an email. I'll review your requirements and schedule a free consultation call to discuss your project in detail and provide a quote.
